QuestData.Title: Cure of Aruunem
QuestData.Description: I need your help in creating an elixir that will allow us passage into the realm of the dead.$B$BIn order to create it I require a sampling of the local vegetation. You will find Aruunem berries scattered about on the island. Bring me as many as you can carry.$b$bBe warned, $n: do not eat them raw! The poison in the berries would kill you within minutes!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 60 Aruunem Berries from around Duskfall Island.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected enough Aruunem berries?
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad you did not eat any berries. I'm not sure what I would do if you were to die.
